DocAttribute.Name: Directrix
DocAttribute.Documentation: The curve used to define the sweeping operation. The solid is generated by sweeping the SELF\IfcSweptAreaSolid.SweptArea along the Directrix.

DocAttribute.Name: StartDistance
DocAttribute.Documentation: Distance expressions indicating the position where the sweeping operation starts along the Directrix. If no distance expression provided the start of the sweeping operation is at the start of the Directrix.

DocAttribute.Name: EndDistance
DocAttribute.Documentation: Distance expressions indicating the position where the sweeping operation ends along the Directrix. If no distance expression provided the end of the sweeping operation is at the end of the Directrix.
